author: txtiger
content:
*Note: This post is low-priority as Fusaka is 2 days away at the time of posting, and also because CFI/SFI decisions are generally low priority.*  

From Nethermind's comment on whether EIP-7932 aligned with the roadmap with its somewhat complicated transaction wrapping schemes, would client teams be less opposed to the proposal if it was a single precompile + registry?

[There is a PR I have drafted to do this](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/10754). Before I merge, I'd appreciate client team feedback on whether this helps implementation in any way.
